releases.title: Single Papa
releases.description: A freshly divorced manchild adopts a baby, exploring his transition to single fatherhood amidst desi family chaos.

releases.title: Mrs Deshpande
releases.description: An Indian adaptation of the French thriller 'La Mante', focusing on a serial killer helping police catch a copycat murderer.

releases.title: Percy Jackson And The Olympians, Season 2
releases.description: Continuation of the fantasy-adventure series based on Percy Jackson novels, featuring modern demigods' quests.
